ProductInfo.Features:
1080p @ 30 fps, 720p @ 60 fps, and 720p @ 30 fps.
Mounts as removable storage on PC/Mac/Linux for easy video transfer.
Fully configurable via free PC configuration tool, Android App, or by manually editing the configuration text file (PC/Mac/Linux).
Camera weighs 1.40 oz (40 g) without mounting sleeve / 1.77 oz (51 g) with mounting sleeve.
Wide angle lens approx. FoV:  116 degrees (1080p) / 63 degrees (720p)
Supports a microSD card up to 32GB in size.  Class 4 recommended.
Includes a Kingston 8 GB class 4 Micro SD card in retail package.
ProductInfo.Name: Wide Angle Mobius ActionCam HD Camera Ultimate Edition (8GB)
